shot¶

main¶

Shot main controller

class spam.controllers.shot.main.Controller(*args, **kwargs)¶

REST controller for managing shots.

edit(proj, sc, sh, **kwargs)¶

Display a EDIT form.

get_all(proj, sc)¶

Return a tab page with a list of shots for a scene and a button to add new shots.

This page is used as the shots tab in the scene view: spam.controllers.scene.main.get_one().

get_delete(proj, sc, sh, **kwargs)¶

Display a DELETE confirmation form.

get_one(proj, sc, sh)¶

Return a tabbed page for shot tabs.

new(proj, sc, **kwargs)¶

Display a NEW form.

post(proj, sc, sh, description=None, action=None, frames=None, handle_in=None, handle_out=None)¶

Create a new shot

post_delete(proj, sc, sh)¶

Delete a shot.

Only delete the shot record from the db, the shot directories must be removed manually. (This should help prevent awful accidents) ;)

put(proj, sc, sh, description=None, action=None, frames=None, handle_in=None, handle_out=None)¶

Edit a shot

tabs¶

Shot tabs

class spam.controllers.shot.tabs.TabController(*args, **kwargs)¶

The controller for shot tabs.

summary()¶

Handle the ‘summary’ tab.

This tab offers a quick view on the current status of the shot.
